events.title: Prancing for Prosthetics 5K
events.description: Join us for our Christmas-themed 5K race benefiting Ashton's Angels! Each participant receives a dri-fit shirt, goodie bag, and a chance to win prizes as one of the top three runners. Bring your Christmas spirit and wear Santa hats, elf suits, antlers, or bells for this festive race. All proceeds go to our philanthropy Ashton's Angels, helping provide prosthetics to those in need.

schedule.notes: Please allow time for check-in as lines can be long. Parking available at Lot 50 near the ETB (Emerging Technology Building).

options.name: General Admission
options.description: Includes race entry and guaranteed shirt

options.name: General Admission
options.description: Includes race entry, shirt not guaranteed

outcome.achievement: Most successful event to date, raising over $10,000 for prosthetic care

events.title: Fajita Fiesta 2018
events.description: Fajita Fiesta is Aggies For Limbs' spring semester food event, offering delicious fajitas and fun activities to raise money for Ashton's Angels. Join us for an afternoon of great food, games, and community spirit!
features: Fajita plate with sides and drink

schedule.notes: Games and activities run throughout the event

options.name: Pre-sale Ticket
options.description: Includes fajita plate, sides, drink, and access to all activities

options.name: At-door Ticket
options.description: Includes fajita plate, sides, drink, and access to all activities

options.name: Event T-shirt
options.description: Available online and at the door
